notice.ch: 『欲加選課程(索取密碼卡)的同學，請務必出席第一堂課，了解課程要求後再進行登記 (如果人數過多，將進行名單篩選或抽籤)』。

department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

remark.ch: 『欲加選課程(索取密碼卡)的同學，請務必出席第一堂課，了解課程要求後再進行登記 (如果人數過多，將進行名單篩選或抽籤)』。

goal.ch:
【重要】本課程為實作課程，請自備筆電來上課。
近年來全球掀起了大數據風潮，從資料中獲取有用的價值是各個領域的重點，本課程將帶領大家使用Python實作資料科學的相關應用。Python 是一種物件導向、直譯式電腦程式語言，近年被大量應用在資料科學的領域中，本課程預期帶領學生以Python程式進行數據分析與學習，從紛亂中分離信號呈現出許多的計算和推理的挑戰，本課程從教育資料探勘的角度來處理與看待資料處理，是進入教育資料探勘之實作課程。
goal.en:
[Important] This course needs the coding environment, please bring your own laptop to the class.
In recent years, there has been a wave of big data in the world, and obtaining useful value from the data is the focus of various fields. This course will lead you to the use of Python to implement data science related applications. Python is an object-oriented, interpreted programming language that has been used extensively in the field of data science in recent years. This course is expected to lead students to use Python programs for data analysis and learning. This course is an implementation course that aims to deal with data processing from the perspective of educational data mining.

outline.ch:
1 Introduction
What is Data Science?, Getting started with Python, Exploratory Data Analysis, Review of probability and probability distributions, Bayes Rule
2 Python program basic
Installation and Setup, Integrated Development Environments (IDEs)
3 Python program basic (1)
Data type, Strings, and Console Output
4 Python program basic (2)
Operators, Conditionals and Control Flow, Functions
5 Python program basic (3)
Lists, Dictionaries,and Set
6 Quiz I
Quiz for Python basic skills
7 Application in data science (1)
Getting Started with pandas
8 Application in data science (2)
Data Loading, Storage, and File Formats
9 Application in data science (3)
Data Wrangling: Clean, Transform,
Merge, Reshape
11 Application in data science (4)
Aggregate functions, descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, association rules, time series processing
12 Data Visualization
Plotting and Visualization
14 Quiz II
Quiz for Python for data processing
15 Educational data minig
Educational data minig and applications
16 Project design and ideation
Project design and ideation
17 Group project implementation
Group project implementation
18 Final report
Team project demo

gradMethod.ch: 出席率10%　PBL討論15%　技術實作25%　團體報告25%　隨堂考25%
gradMethod.en: Attendance rate10%　PBL Discussion15%　Technical practice25%　Group report25%　Quiz25%

flexDiscription.ch: 預計1~2周以實務探討方式進行翻轉教學。
flexDiscription.en: The flipped learning method with the project will be conducted in 1-2 weeks.

ch.competencies: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力
培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning.
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning.
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning.
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to  promote and put network learning in use.
Develop the ability to coordinate and make innovative design.
Develop multi-disciplined  talents with international perspective.

ch: 系所:限網路學習科技研究所碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、網路學習科技研究所博士班。
en: Department:Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in  Institute of Network Learning Technology only.
